Note: This is a deadcat-style frame for 3-inch props
25.5x25.5mm AIO compatible with the Roma L3 frame
VTXs require Ham Radio Technician License
16:9 at 1200TVL w FOV-H 115deg FOV-D 130deg and 4:3 at 1200TVL w FOV-H 115deg FOV-D 145deg
Weight and price are for four motors weight is with wires
Tri-blade props with 1.5mm shaft holes for motor compatibility
Total cost is sub-$300 and sub-250g for the drone itself
